joy: We are so happy to hear! Here are some tips to get your started: https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/221993967-Pok%C3%A9mon-GO-Trainer-guidelines
anger: We are sorry to hear you are having account issues! Please see our FAQ page for guidelines or submit a ticket! https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/sections/204864527-Account-maintenance-and-guidelines
We are so sorry :( You can check the latest updates and guidelines here: https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/sections/204864527-Account-maintenance-and-guidelines
sadness: You can check out our permissions update here! https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/222648408-Permissions-update

anger: Due to the incredible number of Pokémon GO downloads, some Trainers are experiencing server connectivity issues. Don’t worry, our team is on it!
